channel.title: Productivity on @qrui - interetro.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on @qrui - interetro.xyz

item.title: 99 days of Decluttering
item.description: 99 days ago, at some moment on that day, I told myself “hey bro, it’s time to kiss goodbye to those old residents crawling in your read-it-later-but-never-know-when-ish reading list and something like that”.

item.title: DEVONthink 备份清扫
item.description: Devon 本意是英国的德文郡，由于此地的地层最早被研究，便用 Devonian 称呼在此处发现的特地地层。尔后翻译为中文便唤做「泥盆纪」。
